title: 2018's Fiercest Women in Life Sciences
author: Amirah Al Idrus
description: Things are looking up for women—or so they seem. In the era of #MeToo, more and more women are speaking up about workplace harassment and discrimination, and the perpetrators are increasingly held accountable. Industry groups, like the Biotechnology Innovation Organization (BIO), and states, such as California, are implementing rules to increase the proportion of women on corporate boards. | Things are looking up—or so they seem. In the era of #MeToo, more women are speaking up about workplace harassment and discrimination. Industry groups and states are pushing for more women to be included on corporate boards. But in a way, these advances only highlight the hurdles women still face, even women at the top of their fields.
